0a625e2a-7d42-41d0-b94d-a6d4faef886b.description: The GS1 Foundations Online Certificate acknowledges that the individual has completed GS1 US University online event covering the foundational aspects of GS1 product identification and barcoding. Topics include the GS1 Company Prefix to create GS1 identifiers for products, building trade item hierarchies, reviewing common mistakes made during implementation, the most common GS1 barcodes used in accordance with industry best practices, GS1 Package Measurement Rules, and GTIN Management Standard.
0a625e2a-7d42-41d0-b94d-a6d4faef886b.name: GS1 Foundations Online Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete six hours of GS1 US University online training covering the foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, package measurement, and barcoding
Successfully complete interactive assessments within key courses to demonstrate basic understanding of course content

e933e9cf-66de-456b-aabf-d7d63eddcb61.description: The GS1 Fundamentals Certificate acknowledges that the individual has attended a GS1 US University classroom event covering the foundational aspects of the GS1 System of Standards and has an understanding of the GS1 Company Prefix to create GS1 identifiers for products and locations; building trade item hierarchies; and various GS1 barcodes in accordance with industry best practices.
e933e9cf-66de-456b-aabf-d7d63eddcb61.name: GS1 Fundamentals Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a formal instructor-led one-day GS1 US University classroom course covering the foundational aspects for the GS1 System of Standards
Complete an interactive assessment administered during the course, including a hands-on exercise and active participation in an in-classroom assessment

dc2292a9-e5ff-4229-9df3-24db8ddec1c3.description: The GS1 Package Measurement Rules and GTIN Management Standard Certificate acknowledges that the individual has attended a GS1 US University classroom event covering the GS1 Package Measurement Rules and GTIN Management Standard and has an understanding of measuring principles for consumer and non-consumer trade items, and whether or not a new GTIN needs to be assigned based on changes to an existing product, promotions, or new product introduction.
dc2292a9-e5ff-4229-9df3-24db8ddec1c3.name: GS1 Package Measurement Rules and GTIN Management Standard Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Attend a formal instructor-led one-day GS1 US University classroom course covering the GS1 Package Measurement Rules and the GTIN Allocation Rules
Complete an interactive assessment administered during the course, including a hands-on exercise and active participation in an in-classroom assessment

5e69e9ac-c773-4f7b-8fa8-4f89cfc165af.description: The GS1 Connect Advocate badge recognizes individuals that attended GS1 Connect 2022 in San Diego, CA. Attended by industry leaders and digital innovators, the 2-day event helps create advocates for the adoption, use, and adherence of GS1 Standards. Attendees share ideas, and learn best practices on creating an automated, digital, and sustainable supply chain. Session topics and trends include unique identification, data quality and management, visibility, innovation, and emerging technologies.
5e69e9ac-c773-4f7b-8fa8-4f89cfc165af.name: GS1 Connect Standards Advocate

badge_template_activities.title: Attendance at GS1 Connect 2022 held June 7–9 in San Diego, CA

3664c53e-a0eb-4c1f-847a-1580e0dfb5e3.description: The GS1 Standards Certificate acknowledges that the individual has attended a GS1 US University classroom event covering the GS1 General Specifications and has an understanding of navigating the GS1 System of Standards to identify products, locations, etc., and gained familiarity with the various GS1 barcodes in accordance with industry best practices.
3664c53e-a0eb-4c1f-847a-1580e0dfb5e3.name: GS1 Standards Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Obtain a minimum of six-months of working knowledge of GS1 System of Standards
Attend a formal instructor-led 1 and 1/2 day GS1 US University classroom course covering the GS1 General Specifications
Complete the interactive assessment administered during the course

f2ba4db4-24b2-444c-87c1-b89ef01416d4.description: The GS1 Connect Advocate badge recognizes individuals that attended GS1 Connect 2021: Digital Edition. Attended by industry leaders and innovators, this event helps create advocates for the adoption, use, and adherence of GS1 Standards. Shared best practices help attendees go beyond today’s challenges to identify breakthrough solutions for the supply chain of the future. Session topics and trends include unique identification, data quality, visibility, innovation, and supply chain performance.
f2ba4db4-24b2-444c-87c1-b89ef01416d4.name: GS1 Connect Standards Advocate

badge_template_activities.title: Attendance at GS1 Connect 2021: Digital Edition, June 8-10, 2021

6900e8cb-e7ca-4fbe-9e17-724760ce771a.description: The GS1 Standards for UDI Online Certificate acknowledges that the individual has completed GS1 US University online event covering foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, barcoding and sharing of information to the GUDID as part of requirements of FDA UDI rule. Topics include GS1 identifiers for product, trade item hierarchies, common implementation mistakes, common GS1 barcodes in accordance with industry best practices, using GDSN to populate GUDID; implementation project basics.
6900e8cb-e7ca-4fbe-9e17-724760ce771a.name: GS1 Standards for U.S. FDA UDI Online Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete four hours of GS1 US University on-line training covering the foundational aspects of GS1 Product Identification, Barcoding and Information Sharing
Successfully complete assessments within key courses to demonstrate basic understanding of course content

e2225a57-d2cc-4806-93d0-d227ff264fee.description: The GS1 Standards Professional Designation acknowledges that the individual has acquired expert  knowledge of the GS1 System of Standards and can navigate the GS1 General Specifications to apply GS1 Standards to help solve business process challenges.
e2225a57-d2cc-4806-93d0-d227ff264fee.name: GS1 Standards Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Obtain a minimum of six months of working knowledge of GS1 System of Standards or demonstrated knowledge of the GS1 System by completing the pre-requisite online courses
Active member of the GS1 US Solution Partner Program
Attend a formal 2-day GS1 US University classroom course covering the GS1 General Specifications
Pass a high-stakes assessment and maintain the credential via continuing professional development by passing the high-stakes assessment annually or as applicable

181d85a2-30d9-4300-88e9-bc383a76779f.description: The GS1 Foundations Virtual Classroom Certificate acknowledges that the individual has completed GS1 US University virtual classroom event covering the foundational aspects of GS1 product identification and barcoding. Topics include using GS1 Company Prefix to create GS1 identifiers for products and locations, building trade item hierarchies, common GTIN mistakes made during implementation, most common GS1 barcodes used in accordance with industry best practices, and GTIN Management Standard.
181d85a2-30d9-4300-88e9-bc383a76779f.name: GS1 Foundations Virtual Classroom Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete ten hours of GS1 US University virtual classroom training covering the foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, GTIN management, and barcoding
Successfully complete interactive assessments within key courses to demonstrate basic understanding of course content

31060cfe-3db2-4d78-8623-b31ac2a1934c.description: The GS1 Standards for the Drug Supply Chain Security Act (DSCSA) Certificate acknowledges the individual has attended GS1 US University classroom event covering foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, barcoding, and sharing of information as they relate to DSCSA requirements. Topics include creating GS1 product identifiers using your NDC, common GS1 barcodes in accordance with industry best practices and understanding when and how EPCIS is used as related to item-level traceability.
31060cfe-3db2-4d78-8623-b31ac2a1934c.name: GS1 Standards for DSCSA Suppliers Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a formal instructor-led one-day GS1 US University classroom course covering the foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, barcoding and information sharing.
Complete an interactive assessment administered during the course, including a hands-on exercise and active participation in an in-classroom assessment.

75622012-cc3a-4e6c-bcf1-9121d9a06602.description: The GS1 Standards for Drug Supply Chain Security Act (DSCSA) Online Certificate for Suppliers acknowledges that the individual has completed GS1 US University online training covering foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, barcoding, and sharing of information as they relate to the requirements of DSCSA. Topics include creating GS1 product identifiers using your NDC, GS1 barcodes in accordance with industry best practices and how EPCIS is used as related to item-level traceability.
75622012-cc3a-4e6c-bcf1-9121d9a06602.name: GS1 Standards for DSCSA Suppliers Online Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete four hours of GS1 US University online training covering the foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, barcoding and information sharing.
Successfully complete assessments within key courses to demonstrate basic understanding of course content.

7642e5de-8d25-4141-ad35-3bda900e4b53.description: The EDI Essentials Certificate acknowledges that the individual has attended a GS1 US University classroom event covering the basic aspects of the X12 Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) and how various GS1 Standards work in EDI.
7642e5de-8d25-4141-ad35-3bda900e4b53.name: EDI Essentials Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a formal instructor-led 1 1/2 day GS1 US University classroom course covering the X12 EDI Essentials
Complete an interactive assessment administered during the course, including a hands-on exercise and active participation in an in-classroom assessment

e142e3f5-3acc-4186-97ad-05ad3d78a768.description: The GS1 Standards for Product Data Excellence Online Certificate acknowledges that the individual has completed GS1 US University online event covering the three pillars of a strong data quality program, data governance best practices, and how data accuracy can impact costs and efficiency.
e142e3f5-3acc-4186-97ad-05ad3d78a768.name: GS1 Standards for Product Data Excellence Online Certificate Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete four and a half hours of GS1 US University online training covering the data quality program, data governance best practices, and data accuracy impact on costs and efficiency.
Successfully complete interactive assessments within key courses to demonstrate basic understanding of course content

c4e517cb-7277-458a-85f5-d9686c78fccf.description: The GS1 Standards for Food Traceability Online Certificate acknowledges that the individual has completed the GS1 US University online training event covering key practices used to promote case-level traceability using GS1 Standards. Topics include how companies can implement a traceability program using GS1 Standards to identify, capture and share needed case-level traceability information for efficiency and safety.
c4e517cb-7277-458a-85f5-d9686c78fccf.name: GS1 Standards for Food Traceability Online Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete four hours of GS1 US University online training covering key practices used to promote case-level traceability using GS1 Standards
Successfully complete interactive assessments within key courses to demonstrate basic understanding of course content

d98f532b-98f2-40dd-a422-ec52f5bdc0b5.description: The GS1 Foundations for Healthcare Online Certificate acknowledges that the individual has completed the GS1 US University online event covering the foundational aspects of GS1 product and location identification, barcoding, and basics of data sharing . Topics include GS1 Company Prefix based on your labeler code, GS1 identifiers for products and locations, GS1 barcodes , GDSN® overview, introduction to track & trace (EPCIS), GS1 Package Measurement Rules, and GTIN Management Standard.
d98f532b-98f2-40dd-a422-ec52f5bdc0b5.name: GS1 Foundations for Healthcare Online Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete seven hours of GS1 US University online training covering the foundational aspects of GS1 Standards, including product and location identification, package measurement, barcoding, and basics of data sharing.
Successfully complete interactive assessments within key courses to demonstrate basic understanding of course content

e7aa869d-164c-440a-896e-645511c624c6.description: This certificate acknowledges that the named individual has completed GS1 US University training covering the comprehensive concepts relating to the GS1 System of Standards and how to apply them. This includes how globally unique, unambiguous identification is enabled, application of data carriers that encompass GS1 ID keys, gain a holistic understanding of the GS1 System of Standards with emerging standards and technology like GS1 Digital Link, and how to discern GS1’s primary share standards.
e7aa869d-164c-440a-896e-645511c624c6.name: GS1 Standards Advanced Virtual Classroom Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 3 hours of self-paced eLearning modules on various GS1 Standards related topics.

Complete 12 hours of live instructor-led sessions over the course of 3 days. Topics include: principles and benefits of globally unique identification for products and locations; Application of GS1 identification keys, including GTIN, GLN, SSCC, and other primary keys; Emerging standards and technology, including GS1 Digital Link; Barcode quality and verification; Sharing of data via EPCIS, GDSN, and EDI.
Complete the interactive assessment administered during the course.

18eb4413-baac-4ed9-b2e5-9739861afc76.description: The GS1 Package Measurement Professional Designation acknowledges that the individual has acquired expert knowledge of the GS1 Package Measurement Rules and has a solid understanding of measuring principles for consumer and non-consumer trade items.
18eb4413-baac-4ed9-b2e5-9739861afc76.name: GS1 Package Measurement Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Active member of the GS1 US Solution Partner Program
Attend a formal one-day GS1 US University classroom course covering the GS1 Pacakge Measurement Rules
Pass a high-stakes assessment and maintain the credential via continuing professional development by passing the high-stakes assessment annually or as applicable

546c394a-1c20-4a9e-a319-2ff8699f42c9.description: The GS1 Standards for UDI Certificate acknowledges that the individual has attended GS1 US University classroom event covering foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, barcoding and sharing of information to GUDID as part of requirements of the FDA UDI rule. Topics include GS1 identifiers for product, trade item hierarchies, common implementation mistakes, common GS1 barcodes in accordance with industry best practices; using GDSN to populate GUDID; and implementation project basics.
546c394a-1c20-4a9e-a319-2ff8699f42c9.name: GS1 Standards for U.S. FDA UDI Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a formal instructor-led one-day GS1 US University classroom course covering covering the foundational aspects of GS1 Product Identification, Barcoding and Information Sharing
Complete an interactive assessment administered during the course, including a hands-on exercise and active participation in an in-classroom assessment

a14cb309-20cc-4b00-9100-dab14e1b9923.description: The GS1 US Digital Listing Content Professional designation acknowledges that the individual has acquired expert knowledge of the GS1 US Certified Content Provider (CCP) Program, as well as the process, requirements, and guidance on enhancing brand owner product information based on GS1 Standards.
a14cb309-20cc-4b00-9100-dab14e1b9923.name: GS1 US Digital Listing Content Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a formal instructor-led half day GS1 US University classroom course covering the GS1 US Certified Content Provider Program
Active member of the GS1 US Solution Partner Program
Successful completion of an exam to confirm understanding of attributes required as part of the enhanced data set
Must have the GS1 Standards Professional Designation and the GDSN Package Measurement Professional Designation

3cc33fab-ac85-41e5-89dd-ff62b75f87a9.description: The GS1 US Certified Identification Professional acknowledges that the individual has acquired knowledge of the GS1 System of Standards and completed the foundational aspects of GS1 product identification and barcoding. Topics include the GS1 Company Prefix to create GS1 identifiers for products and locations, building trade item hierarchies, GTIN Management Standard, and navigation of the GS1 General Specifications to apply GS1 Standards to help solve business process challenges.
3cc33fab-ac85-41e5-89dd-ff62b75f87a9.name: GS1 US Certified Identification Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete six hours of GS1 US University online training covering the foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, package measurement, and barcoding
Successfully complete interactive assessments within key courses to demonstrate basic understanding of course content
Attend a formal 2-day GS1 US University classroom course covering the GS1 General Specifications
Pass an assessment and maintain the credential via continuing professional development annually or as applicable

a40a8fa1-03a2-4733-9f51-d0e0388a6147.description: The GS1 US National Data Quality Certified Auditor designation acknowledges that the individual has acquired expert knowledge of the GS1 US National Data Quality Program, as well as the process, requirements, and guidance on executing an attribute audit based on GS1 Standards.
a40a8fa1-03a2-4733-9f51-d0e0388a6147.name: GS1 US National Data Quality Certified Auditor

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a formal instructor-led half day GS1 US University classroom course covering the GS1 US National Data Quality Program
Active member of the GS1 US Solution Partner Program
Successful completion of a hands-on quiz to confirm understanding of product/package dimension attribute definitions and measurement principles based on GS1 Standards
Must have the GS1 Standards Professional Designation and the GDSN Package Measurement Professional Designation

95f2c8d7-f015-4251-8d0d-0ddb40fee393.description: The GS1 Standards for Drug Supply Chain Security Act (DSCSA) Online Certificate for Dispensers acknowledges that the individual has completed GS1 US University online training covering foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, barcoding, and sharing of information as they relate to the requirements of DSCSA. Topics include recognizing GS1 product identifiers, interpreting data from a barcode, understanding barcode structure and how EPCIS is used as related to item-level traceability.
95f2c8d7-f015-4251-8d0d-0ddb40fee393.name: GS1 Standards for DSCSA Dispensers Online Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete one and a half hours of GS1 US University online training covering the foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, barcoding and information sharing.
Successfully complete assessments within key courses to demonstrate basic understanding of course content.

47b2911b-2ab2-403a-9907-8776fd2cee78.description: The GS1 Standards for Healthcare Providers Online Certificate Course acknowledges that the individual has completed GS1 US University’s online training covering the foundational aspects of GS1 product and location identification, barcoding basics, and implementation guidance and considerations for capturing and sharing information with healthcare trading partners. This course also introduces the U.S. FDA UDI Rule, the DSCSA, and how GS1 Standards are being used to help implement them.
47b2911b-2ab2-403a-9907-8776fd2cee78.name: GS1 Standards for Healthcare Providers Online Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete one and a half hours of GS1 US University online training covering the foundational aspects of GS1 product identification, barcoding and information sharing.
Successfully complete assessments within key courses to demonstrate basic understanding of course content.
